name: Love me or not demo
description:
Love me or not demo

Hinata finally got the courage to confess to his crush, who is the scariest girl in school. Choose different paths for him and see how the story goes. There are three endings to the demo.

*Note: If you enjoyed it and want to create the full version, make sure to leave a comment.
